title: Among Us And Stardew Valley Collab Brings Free Rewards For A Limited Time
description: GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.                                          If Among Us players aren't too...
body:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.
  
              
          
                If Among Us players aren't too busy trying to root out imposters, the crewmates are getting a little taste of life on the farm in a new collaboration with Stardew Valley."The spacebeans yearn for the cozy charm of farm life, away from the sabotages of space," wrote developer Innersloth ​on the official site for Among Us. "They've gained inspiration from Stardew Valley--it has their two favorite things: tasks and NO Impostors. Unless...?"From now until February 18, 2026, Among Us players can add the Stardew Cosmicube to their collection for free. And it comes with the following Stardew Valley-inspired cosmetics:Junimo PetKrobus PetAbigail’s Outfit SkinAbigail’s Locks HatDance of the Moonlight Jellies NameplateDay’s End NameplateFeathery Friend – Blue HatFeathery Friend – Void HatFeathery Friend – White HatGrandpa’s Beard VisorGrandpa’s Nightcap HatIt’s a New Day NameplateLooking For These? SkinLewis’s Overalls SkinLewis’s Moustache VisorLewis’s Cap HatLinus’s Hair HatLinus’s Beard VisorLinus’s Leaves SkinPrized Straw HatMr. Qi’s Suit SkinMr. Qi’s Shades VisorMr. Qi’s HatSebastian’s Bangs HatSebastian’s Hoodie SkinSpring’s Parsnip HatSummer’s Melon HatVoid Egg HatWork Overalls SkinThere's also a very small update for the game's Create Game screen, which will now feature updated backgrounds to reflect the maps chosen by players.Among Us had a collaboration with Genshin Impact that concluded last month. Innersloth also celebrated the game's seventh anniversary earlier this year. Innersloth also released a non-VR port of Among Us VR, which was renamed Among Us 3D. Outside of the game, the Among Us animated series will debut at some point in the future.As for Stardew Valley, a Switch 2 port is coming this fall with Joy-Con 2 mouse controls and four-player local co-op. However, it might be a long wait before Stardew Valley's 1.7 update is released.
                                  
  
    Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com

title: Fortnite Crew And Xbox Game Pass Ultimate: Everything You Need To Know
description: GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.                                          As of November 18, Fortnite...
body:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.
  
              
          
                As of November 18, Fortnite Crew is now an included benefit with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate. That certainly appears, on its face, like a pretty solid deal, but on the other hand, Game Pass Ultimate got a significant price bump at the same time Fortnite Crew was added, so there are some other factors you might want to take into account before signing up.Let's take a look at the details to see what kind of value this really is.Table of Contents [hide]What you get with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate and Fortnite CrewWhat Xbox Game Pass Ultimate with Fortnite Crew costs Do I need to have an Xbox console to get Fortnite Crew on Game Pass Ultimate?What if I already have Fortnite Crew on Xbox?What if I already have Fortnite Crew on a different platform?What you get with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate and Fortnite CrewXbox Game Pass Ultimate includes a large library of games for both Xbox and PC, including most titles published by Microsoft and its subsidiaries, which include Bethesda and Activision Blizzard. Yes, that includes the newly released Call of Duty: Black Ops 7. The Ultimate plan is the only version of Game Pass that is guaranteed to include new games published under the Xbox banner on day one, and it's also the only tier to include subscriptions from two other publishers--Ubisoft Classics, and EA Play. Fortnite Crew benefits are exactly the same if you subscribe to Game Pass Ultimate as they would be if you bought a standalone Crew subscription. You get access to the current battle pass, music pass, OG pass, and Lego Pass as long as you're subscribed, you'll receive 1,000 V-Bucks and a Crew skin each month you're subscribed, and you'll also get the premium Rocket Pass for Rocket League.What Xbox Game Pass Ultimate with Fortnite Crew costsXbox Game Pass Ultimate now costs $30 a month, a sizable jump from its previous price of $20. By itself, Fortnite Crew costs $12 per month.Do I need to have an Xbox console to get Fortnite Crew on Game Pass Ultimate?There are many ways to play Xbox these days, including consoles, Xbox on PC, Xbox Cloud, and on handhelds like the ROG Xbox Ally--and all Game Pass games are playable via any of those methods. To receive your Crew benefits, you'll need to log in to Fortnite on any of the above-mentioned Xbox platforms at least once each month, and then you can use those benefits while playing on any other platform.But it wouldn't make a lot of sense to subscribe to Game Pass Ultimate unless you plan to play some of the other games that are included. It's not a good value to subscribe to Game Pass Ultimate just for Crew.What if I already have Fortnite Crew on Xbox?If you sign up for Xbox Game Pass Ultimate while you have an active Fortnite Crew subscription through Xbox, the Crew subscription will automatically be canceled. The official FAQs do not say whether you'd receive a pro-rated refund or credit for additional time that might have been remaining on your Crew subscription in that situation, but it would be standard practice to do so.What if I already have Fortnite Crew on a different platform?If you're subscribed to Fortnite Crew through, say, the PlayStation Store, you won't get any additional bonuses in Fortnite from being subscribed to Game Pass Ultimate until the subscription on PlayStation ends. So you may want to cancel your existing Crew subscription and let it run out before signing up for Game Pass Ultimate, if the Crew subscription is one of the deciding factors in your purchase.
                                  
  
    Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com

title: Poppy Playtime Triple Pack On Switch Is At Its Lowest Price In Weeks
description: GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through...
body:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.
  
    
              
          
                                                                                                                                                               October might be the month of Halloween, but let's be honest, November is much scarier. Thanks to Amazon's early Black Friday video game deals, you can indulge in the eerie long winter nights with a discount on the Poppy Playtime Triple Pack for Nintendo Switch, which is on sale for $30 (was $40). That's the lowest price we've seen for the episodic horror game collection in the last 30 days. While the collection is also available on PS5 and Xbox Series X, the discount only applies to the Switch version.                                 Poppy Playtime Triple Pack (Nintendo Switch)                                                                $30 (was $40)                                                                                                                                                                                    The Poppy Playtime Triple Pack includes the first three Poppy Playtime episodes on the cartridge, plus a couple of extra physical bonuses. Here's everything you'll get in this collection:Poppy Playtime Chapter 1: A Tight SqueezePoppy Playtime Chapter 2: Fly in a WebPoppy Playtime Chapter 3: Deep SleepReversible Cover ArtSticker Sheet                      Poppy Playtime Triple Pack physical editionPoppy Playtime is an episodic survival horror game that kicked off in 2021 with its first chapter, A Tight Squeeze. Since then, four chapters have been released, and this collection makes it easy to catch up on the first three, which should only take roughly six hours to complete a single playthrough. A fourth episode, Chapter 4: Safe Haven is also available, but is not included in this collection, and Chapter 5 is slated to release in 2026.Be sure to check out the many other early Black Friday video game deals available at Amazon. If you enjoy Poppy Playtime and are looking for more survival horror, the physical Alan Wake 2 Deluxe Edition on PS5 and Xbox Series X is on sale for $40 (was $60). But if horror doesn't quite jive with you, consider grabbing the charming RPGs Sea of Stars and Dragon Quest I & II HD Remake, which are currently discounted as well, going for $35 (was $40) and $50 (was $60), respectively. Check out a few other early Black Friday game discounts below, or head over to GameSpot's Black Friday 2025 Deals Hub for even more.More Early Black Friday Video Game DealsAlan Wake 2 Deluxe Edition (PS5, Xbox Series X) -- $40 ($60)Dragon Quest I & II HD Remake (Switch 2) -- $50 ($60)EA Sports FC 26 (PS4, PS5, Switch, Switch 2, Xbox Series X) -- $35 ($70)Lunar Remastered Collection (PS4, Switch, Xbox One) -- $44 ($55)Red Dead Redemption (Switch) -- $25 ($30)Sea of Stars (PS4, PS5, Switch, Xbox Series X) -- $25 ($40)                                                                                                                                               Sign up for GameSpot's Weekly Deals Newsletter:                                Meta Quest 3S VR Headset Black Friday Deals Are Live At Amazon                         Grab A Wireless GameCube-Style Controller For Switch 1/2 & PC For Only $40                         Amazon-Exclusive Lunar Remastered Collection Gets First Price Cut                                   + Show More More Gaming, Tech, and Entertainment Deals & Preorders Links (4)                 Final Fantasy Magic: The Gathering Deal - Save $45 On Play Booster Box                         Sunrise On The Reaping New Collector's Gift Edition Is Already Discounted At Amazon                         Lego DC Batman Figure & Bat-Pod Is Over 50% Off At Amazon, Sold Out Everywhere Else                         Honkai: Star Rail 8BitDo Ultimate 2 Collector's Bundle Gets First Discount
